item.title: A Star Wars Wine Companion
item.description:
A Star Wars Wine Companion

Choosing the right bottle in the vast world of wine can often seem like navigating the galaxy. Star Wars: The Force Awakens set a new box office record this week-so obviously there are many out there who share my fondness for the epic film series.

item.title: All American Heroes: American Whiskeys | Wine Enthusiast Magazine
item.description:
All American Heroes: American Whiskeys | Wine Enthusiast Magazine

Kara Newman reviews spirits and writes about spirits and cocktail trends for Wine Enthusiast. She's the author of Cocktails for a Crowd (Chronicle Books, 2013) as well as a forthcoming book, also from Chronicle, about equal-parts cocktails. Email: spirits@wineenthusiast.net

item.title: Coming Soon: Stone Arch
item.description:
Coming Soon: Stone Arch

Minnesota is fast becoming the Land of 10,000 Brews. There are more than 110 licensed breweries in the state, up from just five a decade ago. Stone Arch, a Minnesota craft-beer restaurant, which will be located in the Airport Mall near the entrance to Concourse F (in the former Chili's space), aims to celebrate the...

item.title: Say Goodbye to These Beloved Whiskies
item.description:
Say Goodbye to These Beloved Whiskies

The onset of the New Year is a time to look ahead for many, with resolutions made and goals set. But it also offers a chance to reflect. Here, it's time to look back fondly at the whiskey we lost in 2015, and to examine the ongoing occurrence of whiskey vanishing from store shelves going into the future.

item.title: You Are Not Allergic to Sulfite
item.description:
You Are Not Allergic to Sulfite

Now that's what I call an allergic reaction! One of the things I hear frequently from people who find out I'm a technical guy for winemaking is, "I'm allergic to the sulfite in wine. What can I do?" My heart sinks when I hear this.

item.title: New Booze: BĒT Vodka, crafted from Minnesota sugar beets
item.description:
New Booze: BĒT Vodka, crafted from Minnesota sugar beets

Minnesota is the number one sugar beet-producing state in the country. It should follow that we would be distilling some of that bounty into booze. BĒT Vodka (pronounced "beet") is Minnesota's first vodka distilled from 100% sugar beets ( L'etoile Vodka from Du Nord Craft Spirits is distilled from a mix of sugar beets and corn).

item.title: Zymurgy's 2015 Best Beers in America Results - American Homebrewers Association
item.description:
Zymurgy's 2015 Best Beers in America Results - American Homebrewers Association

Each year we ask magazine readers to share a list of their 20 favorite beers that are commercially available in the United States. We've tallied the votes, and here are the results for the 2015 Best Beers in America survey, including Top Ranked Beers, Top Breweries, Best Porfolio and Top Imports.

item.title: How To Stock The Perfect Home Bar: INFOGRAPHIC | VinePair
item.description:
How To Stock The Perfect Home Bar: INFOGRAPHIC | VinePair

One of our 34 drinking resolutions for 2015 is to put together a solid home bar. If your personal bar is lacking, this infographic will help you level up your cocktail game. We've listed the basic spirits, mixers, barware and glassware that every home bar should have.
